pdb2sql: Processing PDB data with SQL¶

pdb2sql is a Python package that allows to use SQL queries to handle PDB files.

Installation:

pip install pdb2sql

Tutorial¶

  • 10 minutes to pdb2sql

Python API¶

  • PDB2SQL

  • Strcuture Similarity
